website_summaries.verdict: A basic, fairly small TV that comes at an amazingly low price. In spite of a few quality concerns, it tops our list as the most budget-friendly model on today's market.
pros: An unbeatable deal with decent quality for the price
LED and 720p resolution provides bright, vivid colors
cons: The sound is subpar – owners describe it as "tinny."
HDMI and cable ports are on the side instead of in back, which some owners found awkward

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it is garbage.  BAD PICTURE AND SOUND
customer_reviews.text: The picture is bad and the sound quality is even worse. I tried to return it but the company wont pay return shipping and the cost of shipping was almost half of the cost of the TV. I don't write negative reviews normally but I had to let everyone know.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV is just what I needed. The picture is clear and there is no problem with the sound. The setup was easy. I even get more channels than I did with my TV I replaced. Great TV for price and size. This is a winner for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cason

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect TV for my daughters room
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect TV for my daughters room. She does not have a very big room and I did not want the TV to be the biggest presence.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Junod

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and thoughtfully packaged.
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is quite acceptable. We are using them as CCTV monitors. The price was what drew our attention. Of note is the packaging. They came well packaged with a convenient strap to assist removing the TV from the box. Also, they came packaged with their own handy screwdriver to attach the base with. The remote and menu are intuitive and clear. We are quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Welch

customer_reviews.title: not smart TV. Looks very cheap
customer_reviews.text: This TV is only regular TV, not smart TV. Looks very cheap.Screen sometimes scramble.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Le

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable picture quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I’m replacing my old Insignia TCC with this unit. For the price, picture quality is much better than the old unit and installation on the wall took inly 10 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Yeow

customer_reviews.title: This makes 5.
customer_reviews.text: This makes the 5th Sceptre TV I have purchased this year. I think the quality and performance is well beyond their affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Sound is off
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tv even though most reviews had issues with sound. The sound isn't the greatest but I get used to it. The problem I have is after a couple hours the sound doesn't match the mouth movement. I turn the tv off and on again and it's fixed. Not a huge problem but a real annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Herrneckar

customer_reviews.title: GREAT picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: My mom loved it . Fit in her kitchen perfectly. Nice clear picture and great sound .
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great tv!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our new TV in the bedroom. This is a perfect size. Very lightweight and easy to install. Very easy to take off the wall mount to store when on the move and super quick to reattach when ready to use. Great picture quality and a great value...
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound
customer_reviews.text: Picture was ok, but sound was terrible. Tinny like a broken speaker. I did not ask for a replacement. Perhaps it would have worked properly???
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: A great little unit!  Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We bought it to fit into a tight space in our Park Model bedroom. The picture quality is great and the remote control has all the features needed for a great viewing experience. Easy to set up out of the box. Can't go wrong with this unit. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is good, device design looks good. Sure, sound matches the budget price but still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these they last about 3 years of 8-10 hours of use per day. I think they are well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: It was for my mother in law who is old and kind of exacting about many things. It is a great product. I wish they had more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That you will need an antenna if you do not have cable
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. Look and sound excellent for my kitchen. Did need an antenna for the channels.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Great television
customer_reviews.text: The picture is unbelievable. I bought this for an elderly woman and she’s in love with it
customer_reviews.author: Judy wittig

customer_reviews.title: Glaring
customer_reviews.text: Do not put in a room by a window. Other than that great deal
customer_reviews.author: Cindy F.

customer_reviews.title: TV sound
customer_reviews.text: TV, product# E1958V-SRD8BZTV53MA, Overall for the price is good. But the speaker is terrible. I'm going to keep the TV and try to find a external speaker.
customer_reviews.author: CLYDE BYERS

customer_reviews.title: good tv
customer_reviews.text: The TV works great, good colors and image. it is a good brand. in a few months the control has some problems, but the quality of the TV is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: There is no color everything is black and white. There's also a spot in the middle of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda heist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a small bedroom or bathroom. Nice picture, and easy setup.
customer_reviews.author: JADE M. CLAPPER

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY BEDROOM TV/DVD PLAYER
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY GRANDDAUGHTER'S ROOM AS IT IS SMALL. PLACED IT ON A SMALL CONSOLE TABLE FOR HER REACH. SHE WATCHES ALL OF HER DVD'S THERE ON A HEADSET. EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.author: LSCassar

customer_reviews.title: My reason for return
customer_reviews.text: This product is great but I bought it for my mother-in-law, she was 101 years old n wanted one-before the Nursing home put it up, she passed away.....
customer_reviews.author: judi trinkle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very nice TV for the price. For my bedroom, just right size
customer_reviews.author: Carole Filmanowicz

customer_reviews.title: Returned-- missing base
customer_reviews.text: Returned due to missing base. After reading other reviews, I probably should not have ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Fredda F. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Only had one flaw: it didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival. This paperweight sat in the box for a couple weeks until I got around to using it and it did not turn on AT ALL. I tried different outlets and both the on-set buttons and the remote control. Nothing worked. Now I have to return it. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: M.G. Trehern

customer_reviews.title: Picture and sound are unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Hoped this one would be better than the other brand that lasted 2 years. Big mistake. You have to be 6 feet from the screen to see color. Sound is tinny. The twin brand is the same price. Dont buy this one
customer_reviews.author: docentdon123

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the picture quality is not that great. I will say that the price and size was perfect for what I need. This TV was put in my bathroom. I enjoy my Netflix movies while I take a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine as a specialty TV
customer_reviews.text: This 19" small TV was perfect for our bathroom. Works great and the pricing was very very good. It would not work well as main TV unless you view in a limited space such as a sewing room, kitchen, or bathroom as the viewing angle is somewhat limited.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J Green

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Nice little tv for the money. I bought it for my laundry room
customer_reviews.author: clipper

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is really bad
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the fact that you have to be level with the screen to see it clearly.
customer_reviews.author: JenSing

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Given limited space, this little one worked well and hooked up seamlessly with my daughter's Apple TV module.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Pantaleo

customer_reviews.title: Decent picture but HORRIBLE sound quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little tv with decent picture quality, but wow the sound quality is TERRIBLE!!! It sounds like you're listening to it through a brick wall! Ive had tvs smaller than this with better sound! Absolutely not worth the price!! Sending this back asap!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Can not be used on a wall mount.
customer_reviews.text: You have to watch tv straight forward not elevated On a wall mount, when you look up at it the picture is like shadows.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent P.

customer_reviews.title: Left outside
customer_reviews.text: The TV was fine I'm just upset that no one rung the doorbell or knocked to let me know the TV was sitting outside. I'm glad my neighborhood is decent enough that it didn't get stolen
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the sound but it's the old you get what you pay for !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J Cianci

customer_reviews.title: one of the best "small screened" tvs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect picture for perfect size. Not easy to find. Smaller units are not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Flower

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound
customer_reviews.text: Tearable sound on this TV. Picture is only good if you're directly in front of it. I do not recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: PHSC

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: This is my first and last time purchasing a Sceptor product. I recently picked this up at Walmart. I don't know why people are giving this 4 and 5 stars. Must be employees of Sceptor. The picture quality absolutely sucks and the sound is 'tinny', even when going though all the video and sound settings.... all things become apparently subpar. At this day and age.... C'mon!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Moser

customer_reviews.title: Do'nt buy this TV
customer_reviews.text: This is just an awful TV, the picture quality is poor at best ( non HD cable). The sound is even worse I will need to get some speakers if I am going to keep it. If you think you can just hook this up to your coax cable and it will work you are wrong. You need to rent a converter box from you cable company.
customer_reviews.author: photo guy

customer_reviews.title: Bought again to replace broken one.
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift from my husband when the first one like it was broken. It was in our camper and this was to replace it. It is not usable because it did not come with the same base but instead has legs. The picture on the one we ordered ( and pulled up order again) had the base as did the first tv. Now I either have to return it or find a base. I would also add that the box looked to have been previously opened so I wonder if I have received a returned product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayaker

customer_reviews.title: Tv did not work when recd. company refused to honor warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Unit ended up in my trash. Did not work when recd. and company would not honor warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Penny saver

customer_reviews.title: price
customer_reviews.text: Its a 720 screen not 1080 and for that price its a great TV. You bought a cheap TV. Remember: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR. I RECOMMEND IT
customer_reviews.author: BCR

customer_reviews.title: Faulty speaker
customer_reviews.text: Has a great picture but my right speaker is already sounding bad so I'm just using the left. Recomend external speakers or sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely Love this tv
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love this tv! It has excellent picture & sound quality & it's lightweight which was a plus for me because i purchased it for my office. The box has a thick plastic handle for easy transporting. Perfect for the kitchen & bedroom as well. Would have gave 5 stars, but it takes me 5 minutes to balance the tv on my desk because the stand i received is missing the flat part so im having to balance it in the round ball.And yes it does come with a remote control even though it doesnt specify in the advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley D. Moore

product_meta.title: Sceptre 19" Class HD (720P) LED TV (E195BV-SR)
product_meta.description: The Sceptre 19” LED HDTV (E195BV-SR) requires little space but still delivers captivating entertainment. The wide selection of colors that 720P resolution has to offer will never fail to impress you. 1 HDMI ports allow you to connect your devices to this LED HDTV so you can catch up on your favorite show and stream your online internet content. The brush finish on the surface of this 19” LED TV not only provides protection from scratches, but is also pleasing to the touch. Possessing quality in both design and performance, this energy saving HDTV is the perfect addition to your ever evolving décor.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars91 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
